name: Hera´s Revenge v2023
description:
Story

Zeus and his wife Hera were happy and content, Olympus had been enjoying an era of peace and prosperity - but all was not as it seemed. At the other end of the universe, Hades, God of the Underworld, harbored a deep resentment towards his brother Zeus.

Blinded by jealousy for the good life his brother enjoyed in the heavens, Hades plots to overthrow Zeus and capture Olympus for his own. After negotiations with their brother Poseidon, Hades finally convinces him not to intercede, and escapes through a crack in his underworld prison! He takes a secret path through the sky into the heavens above, capturing Zeus unawares.

Hades overpowers the shocked and disoriented Zeus, imprisoning him and proclaiming himself to be God of the Underworld AND of the Heavens. The Olympians despair, void of all hope, little knowing that hope is not completely lost! Unbeknownst to Hades, Tan SKULLIOR, a soldier of old, is coming to conquer him and the entire world! But what became of Hera?

Upon waking to Zeus's cries for help, Hera manages to escape with barely a minute to spare. She steels herself, determined to take revenge on Hades and free her husband. With this, an adventure begins...

HERA'S REVENGE
